Text:
Dud, thnx for the uploads, but, one of my friend's friend's friend had the complete collection of POI series with him and i took it from him, 

so dont bother uploading the next episodes(As you said that u r uploading it for me and u r not sure that others really download it).

I am really sorry for bothering you to upload these episodes. I hope u r not angry(or upset) with me...

@krisnisc - comm'on dude... the source is 2.81 gb ... and I had 2 download this everyday
ofcourse I am upset (but not angry) .... coz there are less seeds for these and I got bad reputation in some sites coz of this (since a beginner).
Also some sites say there are only 1 seed (which is me obviously) ... aren't  u seeding the downloaded torrents??
atleast seed those torrents that u have downloaded until u remove it from ur system

BTW.. thanx for recommending this series ... now I too am addicted to it

hope our friendly relations aren't lost
any more requests are welcome

from now on i'll try to do the latest  POI episodes
if it makes u happy ..
